more.info.help.title: Help & Information
more.info.help.lead: Here you can find the essentials to get oriented quickly. Save this area for when you need reassurance or a quick recap.
more.info.help.point1: Open Today to see what is planned and follow the cards step by step.
more.info.help.point2: Tap the bell icon in the header to stay informed about reminders and updates.
more.info.help.point3: Need more assistance? Use the settings icon to reach support without leaving your current page.
more.info.privacy.title: Privacy
more.info.privacy.lead: We keep data lean and readable so you stay in control. Your personal details are only used to tailor your experience.
more.info.privacy.point1: Profile data such as your name and preferences stay tied to your account for personalization.
more.info.privacy.point2: We do not sell your information. Data is only used to improve Fit4Seniors and deliver your features.
more.info.privacy.point3: You can request exports or changes anytime by contacting support from the header settings icon.
more.info.safety.title: Safety & Tips
more.info.safety.lead: Training should always feel safe. Use these quick checks before you start and whenever you need a pause.
more.info.safety.point1: Create space around you, wear stable shoes, and keep water nearby.
more.info.safety.point2: Move slowly at first. Stop immediately if you feel pain, dizziness, or shortness of breath.
more.info.safety.point3: Keep a phone within reach and train near stable support when possible.
more.info.about.title: About Fit4Seniors
more.info.about.lead: Fit4Seniors is built with therapists and coaches to keep movement simple, motivating, and safe.
more.info.about.point1: Clear guidance, readable layouts, and calm pacing so you can focus on movement.
more.info.about.point2: Programs are designed with seniors in mind—no complex controls, just practical steps.
more.info.about.point3: We continuously improve with your feedback to keep the experience trustworthy and supportive.
